title: The Light And Dark Side Of Seventeen
description: The Light and Dark Side of Seventeen is the story of two teenage girls -- circa 1959. Both suffered tragedies early in their lives, and for that, they each pay a price. One of the girls, Pattie, was level-headed, focused, and grounded by a strong support system. The other girl, a lost soul named Dolly was not so fortunate. She only had her self-created world to rely upon. Along many a rough road, both girls learn the importance of good friendships,accountability, and the daytime nightmares that occur when we allow the lines of truth and reality to blur. (Rated for adult audiences and mature young adults)
author: Judith Kristen
